links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Knödel Numbers.
maple: with(numtheory);knodel:=proc(i,k)local a,n,ok;for n from k+1 to i do  ok:=1;  for a from 1 to n do     if gcd(a,n)=1 then  if (a^(n-k) mod n)<>1 then ok:=0; break; fi; fi;  od;  if ok=1 then print(n); fi;od;end:knodel(1000,4) # _Paolo P. Lava_, Feb 24 2012
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
